Each project marks a step in my continuous growth üåü, with new skills and technologies driving my evolution as a developer.

Monthly Hobbies Planner

For individuals eager to reflect on and plan their monthly journey, the Monthly Planner template offers an ideal solution. Designed to provide users with a clean slate for organizing their monthly activities, this template facilitates seamless goal setting and task management. Beyond simply outlining monthly objectives, users can also utilize the planner to curate lists of movies to watch, places to visit, and books to read, adding a touch of personalization to their planning process.

Embracing a structured approach to daily life through the use of a planner not only enhances productivity but also minimizes stress levels, empowering individuals to accomplish more and pursue their goals with greater clarity and efficiency.

See the planner
Black Rock Pilates&Yoga Studio

When selecting a Pilates & Yoga studio, the paramount consideration is finding a space where you feel at ease. A truly enriching Pilates & Yoga experience revolves around fostering a supportive and inclusive community, one that embraces individual journeys and encourages exploration of one's practice. There should be no room for judgment regarding technical proficiency, physical appearance, or attire choices.

By offering the flexibility to choose and book sessions at your convenience, we invite you to join us on the mat, where we prioritize your comfort and growth as we embark on this transformative journey together. Let's meet at the mat!

Book Your Class
Longevity

The Longevity project offers a comprehensive solution for estimating daily calorie requirements, whether it's for weight maintenance, loss, or gain. By enabling users to input the calorie values of their meals and exercises, Longevity simplifies the process of monitoring and managing daily caloric intake. With the added feature of searching for food items and calculating recipe calories, users can effortlessly stay informed about their nutritional consumption.

Equipped with this knowledge, tracking daily intake becomes a seamless endeavor, empowering users to make informed dietary choices and achieve their health and fitness goals effectively with the assistance of Longevity.

CSS

Bootstrap

JavaScript

Track your daily
Movies&Book Tracker

For individuals who struggle to remember the movies they've watched or the books they've read, the Movies & Book Tracker project offers a convenient solution. Designed as a diary to capture thoughts and opinions about movies as they are watched, or to simply keep track of past films, this template serves as a reliable archive for entertainment preferences. Users can seamlessly review, rate, and comment on movies, facilitating discussions and recommendations with friends and fellow enthusiasts. Beyond its primary function of tracking movies, the template also extends its utility to include book tracking, allowing users to maintain a comprehensive record of their literary and cinematic experiences..

Users can effortlessly organize and review the movies and books they've encountered, creating a personalized archive of their entertainment journey. Whether it's revisiting favorite films or discovering new ones, the tracker provides a platform for users to share their experiences and recommendations with friends, fostering a sense of community and enriching the entertainment exploration process. With features tailored for both movie buffs and bookworms alike, this project serves as a versatile tool for curating and celebrating individual tastes and preferences.

Tailwind

DaisyUI

ReactJS

See the tracker
Riverside Farm

The Riverside Farm project introduces a unique concept in the realm of meal kit services, offering an affordable option that prioritizes the use of fresh ingredients, straightforward cooking techniques, and robust flavors. It caters to individuals who relish the experience of cooking yet appreciate the convenience of a meal kit delivery service. With a diverse menu featuring an array of enticing options, customers have the flexibility to select their preferred meals on a weekly basis, all conveniently delivered to their doorstep.

What sets Riverside Farm apart is its personalized approach to meal kits. Upon signing up, clients have the opportunity to curate their own recipes, which are then stored in the database for future use. This customization extends to the ability to edit, add, or remove items from their meal kits at any time, ensuring a tailored culinary experience that meets their preferences and dietary needs. Additionally, clients are encouraged to provide feedback to enhance the website's functionality and improve their overall user experience, fostering a collaborative environment focused on continual improvement and customer satisfaction.

Tailwind

ReactJS

Firebase

Order Your Meal
Eye Watering Words

Eye Watering Words is an innovative platform designed to empower users to share their thoughts, ideas, and experiences in a dynamic and interactive environment. Whether it's expressing personal reflections, providing feedback, or engaging in discussions, the platform serves as a space for creativity and connection. Users can easily post entries, comment on others' contributions, and customize their profiles, fostering a sense of individuality and community.

What makes Eye Watering Words stand out is its seamless functionality and user-friendly design. From secure authentication to personalized profiles, the platform ensures an intuitive and enjoyable experience. Users can organize their thoughts through custom tags, search for specific topics or individuals, and manage their content effortlessly. The commenting system further enhances interaction, allowing users to engage with the community by sharing insights and perspectives.

Built with cutting-edge technologies like React, Redux, and MongoDB, Eye Watering Words offers a secure, scalable, and responsive solution for digital expression. By combining modern design with robust backend architecture, this project provides a space where creativity meets functionality, enabling users to connect, communicate, and thrive.

ReactJS

Redux

MongoDB-NodeJS
